input.sentences: the awards ceremony and graduation was today .
everyone stood up at the front proudly .
the principal congratulated all of the kids .

output.sentences: The Japanese students stand to watch the other students being presented with something on stage.
All the students assemble a group line.
A woman stands in front of a group of female students.
A student begin to take pictures of two other students.
The Japanese female students say bye by showing the peace sign.
